title: Buffalo man shot while hunting in Chautauqua County
content:
ARKWRIGHT – A Buffalo man was shot in the left leg by a fellow deer hunter Saturday morning off Meadows Road in the Chautauqua County Town of Arkwright.
Joseph McAndrews, 33, was airlifted to Erie County Medical Center, where he was released after treatment.
Trooper James O’Callaghan, State Police public information officer, said the incident occurred about 8:20 a.m., when a 17-year-old hunter fired a 12-gauge shotgun at a doe and hit McAndrews instead. The investigation remains open, but the shooting was deemed accidental, O’Callaghan said.
